item.title: Report X-2024090616
item.description:
Report X-2024090616

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-12T09:14:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-30
  • City: SHREVEPORT
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE SATURDAY DELIVERY AIR PACKAGE WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. INSPECTION OF CONTENTS REVEALED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING A BOX MARKED FROZEN PRODUCT AND MM CLASSIC STYLE LEMONADE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM LOUISIANA USING UPS ACCOUNT 81Y304, MKTPLC / DAILY IMPORT EXPORT CO, 500 BUSSE RD, ELK GROVE VILLAGE IL 60007. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
